resources.string:
Thank you for downloading BudgetMe.
 This is an easy-to-use app with self explanatory button to guide you through your steps.
 Here is a small text tutorial to get your way around the app:
 You'll always start out at the homepage with will show your monthly statistics (and daily statistics optionally).
 From there, you can go to Add or Remove Expenses using Add/Remove Expenses button.
 If you'd like to view your expenses, you can head to Track Your Stats.
 Finally, if you'd like to change your settings, you can head to Configure.

- Do check out the credits page to see the names of the people who contributed to this app
